page.title: 13A Visit to Tadcaster
page.content: Tadcaster and its surroundings have much of interest to offer the tourist and so there is a lot of potential for {tourism.}Tadcaster is well known for its breweries and its{public houses,} which it has a lot of. It also has a museum and plenty of{old buildings including the remains of a Roman Castle. There is much to please the sightseer with the beautiful River Wharfe with its weir and viaduct. Accommodation is well provided for with historic York only a few miles away. If the car breaks down, there are plenty of garages to get it back on the road. To help the tourist have a good time, there are dances some nights and you are never far from a pub in Tadcaster. Surrounding the town is some marvellous{countryside}which can be explored on foot along the numerous footpaths.
